name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Skilled in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **OpenTelemetry**, and **Cloudwatch** for enhanced observability, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience transitioning into a Senior SRE Engineer role. I specialize in building and maintaining high-performance solutions, leveraging my proficiency in **Python** and DevOps methodologies. My technical background spans full-stack development using frameworks like **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, while effectively integrating **AI** and **ML** solutions into robust systems to optimize operations.

My significant experience in developing enterprise-grade applications is fortified by my knowledge of CI/CD automation, coupled with a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems. I have successfully led projects that enhance real-time data processing capabilities while ensuring compliance with standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. With a strong emphasis on problem-solving and effective communication, I strive to ensure reliability and scalability in all applications I oversee.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented enterprise-level **DevOps** pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, incorporating linting, testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments for web and API services, improving deployment efficiency by **30%**.
Utilized **AWS**, including **CloudFormation** and **Cloudwatch**, to enhance observability and monitoring across applications, leading to a **40%** reduction in incident response times.
Architected and developed scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms using **Python** and modern frameworks, ensuring compliance with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, while handling **100k+** transactions daily.
Designed and maintained cloud-native infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, optimizing deployment processes and reducing manual intervention by **50%** through automation.
Enhanced system observability by implementing **OpenTelemetry** and leveraging **DataDog** for real-time monitoring and analytics, improving the identification of system bottlenecks by **25%**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to communicate system updates and troubleshoot issues, fostering a culture of problem-solving and proactive system management.
Integrated AI and ML capabilities to support predictive analytics, enabling data-driven decision making in operational processes for healthcare and financial domains.
Conducted thorough testing with frameworks such as Jest and PyTest, ensuring a robust and error-free codebase across both front-end and backend services, contributing to a **20%** increase in software quality metrics.

Utilized **AWS** for infrastructure management and provisioning, enhancing the reliability and scalability of financial platforms through **Terraform** automation strategies.
Implemented comprehensive observability solutions with **OpenTelemetry**, **Cloudwatch**, and **DataDog**, ensuring high service uptime and proactive incident response across financial applications.
Led the development and modernization of financial platforms using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) in a microservices-based architecture, improving scalability and maintainability for high-volume transaction systems.
Built dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **Typescript**, employing Redux Toolkit and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Developed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to track financial activity and generate actionable insights.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven architecture, enhancing asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions and compliance workflows.
Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time data ingestion from internal and third-party sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to proactively identify anomalies in banking systems.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services for real-time decision-making.

Implemented observability strategies with **Cloudwatch** and **DataDog** to monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues in real-time, ensuring high availability and reliability of backend services.
Utilized **AWS** infrastructure for scalable service deployment and management, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure as code (IaC) to streamline resource provisioning and configuration across multiple environments.
Designed and optimized backend services in **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and Node.js (NestJS, Express) for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring **99.9% uptime** with low latency and efficient load handling.
Engineered real-time features using WebSockets and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking with an average **response time of under 200ms**.
Led the integration of AI/ML-based recommendation engines utilizing **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance product listings, achieving an **increase in conversion rates by 15%** based on real-time user behavior.
Applied **Redis** caching for product metadata, with measurable improvements in application responsiveness, reducing database read pressure by **30%** during peak traffic periods.
Facilitated effective communication and problem-solving across cross-functional teams to implement blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes** and **LaunchDarkly**, ensuring controlled rollouts and minimizing risks during platform updates.
Optimized frontend applications using **React 18**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular** combined with **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit**, driving enhanced user experiences with **load times reduced by 25%** on web and mobile platforms.
Implemented secure, PCI-compliant payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring safe transaction processes for users on the platform.
Enforced role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure customer and admin access, guaranteeing GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the e-commerce platform.
